rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with power greater than its base power.
Psyop {W} [i](You may cast this face down for {2} as an artifact with “{1}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate as a sorcery.” Pay its psyop cost as a sorcery to exile then cast it.)[/i]
